title: My account has been permanently suspended for using 3rd party program. I haven't used them.
body:
Hi guys,
I've been permanently banned yesterday morning for the usage of 3rd party programs. I haven't played on the account for 10 days, because i am on a vacation currently. I tried to login, just to see what rank are my friends, and suddenly a message popped up saying that i should view the email associated with the account. I read the message and it says that i am using 3rd party programs. Without a single warning my account got banned and I haven't even used 3rd part programs besides MKJogo that i have deleted a long time ago. Three/Four months ago they sent me a message on my email saying that i should delete MKJogo. I've done it. A few days later they said that the usage of MKJogo is still active and they said that i should try to remove it with CCleaner or by reinstalling my operating system(wtf?). I've done it with CCleaner and it isn't on my computer anymore. I contacted Riot and they said that i am using 3rd party programs and that they can't share what they have found. I mean, to get banned without a warning, without information on what kind of 3rd party programs have you used...is just not fair. I have invested a lot of effort, money and time on that account. It's current rank is Gold 2. Tried to reach Platinum. I have an another "smurf account" that i use when i play with a friend who is low level. Somehow, that account hasn't been banned for using 3rd party programs. Any help? Or can i get the account unbanned by "reinstalling my operating system"?
Programs that i used while playing:
1)Curse Voice
2)Skype
3)SkinSpotlightsReplays
NOTE THAT I HAVE INSTANTLY DELETED MKJOGO AFTER I RECEIVED THE EMAIL FROM RIOT ABOUT MK. (4 MONTHS AGO)
